previewArticle.title: Argentina vs. Belgium: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Quarterfinal Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Argentina 1, Belgium 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Quarterfinal Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 1': We are under way between #ARG and #BEL in a quarterfinal showdown. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: World Breaking News
timelineItems.text: A show of suppo for Neymar at #ARGvBEL #BRA http://t.co/hPY48KadR2

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: 8': GOAL #ARGENTINA! Higuaìn opens the scoring for the South American side. 1-0 #ARG. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jack Holmes
timelineItems.text: GOAL!!! What a start!!! Beautifully struck ball off the volley!!! 1-0 Argentina!!! #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: Quite a goal. Yet again Messi is involved. The guy is just brilliant. #argvbel

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Messi holds, turns, twists. Di Maria with a deflected pass. Higuain with a fine finish. #ARGvBEL https://t.co/3Z6nlvY8nQ

timelineItems.name: Jeff in Orlando
timelineItems.text: Yikes, Gonzalo Higuaín with an early world-class strike, he puts #arg ahead early 1-0 8' #ARGvBEL #wc2014

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: El "Pipita" se sacude la sal y anota su gol número 22 con la selección argentina: http://t.co/vj4l1xRRpO #ARGvBEL http://t.co/epxQsoy94B

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: El "Pipita" se sacude la sal y anota su gol número 22 con la selección argentina: http://t.co/vj4l1xRRpO #ARGvBEL http://t.co/epxQsoy94B

timelineItems.name: Marcelo Dos Santõs
timelineItems.text: Wonder how Belgium will recover from this blow. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ezequiel Lavezzi (Argentina) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Mascherano.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bro
timelineItems.text: Right place at the right time with a brilliant strike. This could be a very fun match. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne (Belgium) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Eden Hazard.

timelineItems.name: Same 'ol Gee♠
timelineItems.text: I won't be surprised. If this is the only goal in this game,hence the trend of previous matches #ARGvBEL #Worldcup2014

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Belgium. Conceded by José Basanta.

timelineItems.name: HumphreEscobarOkullu
timelineItems.text: Looking like the over hyped #BEL finally going home. Theirr departure from Brazil has been long overdue. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marouane Fellaini (Belgium).
Lionel Messi (Argentina) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: Have no idea how Prince Harry pulls it off but he looks good wearing the BURRDA Belgium #7 jersey #KevinDeBruyne #LaBelgique #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Belgium. Conceded by Ezequiel Garay.

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Kevin De Bruyne is distracted by a drone, which explains his horrible, horrible shot. #ARGvBEL http://t.co/2Yohh7gIYC

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Kevin De Bruyne is distracted by a drone, which explains his horrible, horrible shot. #ARGvBEL http://t.co/2Yohh7gIYC

timelineItems.name: Tjaart Cronje
timelineItems.text: #Belgium ya tutela. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Vincent Kompany (Belgium) header from the left side of the six yard box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Brad Chuck
timelineItems.text: Even though Argentina have taken the lead, you expect the Belgian subs bench to make their mark in the 2nd half #ArgVBel #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Axel Witsel (Belgium) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lionel Messi (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: When Marouane Fellaini heads the ball - does he feel anything? #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Låsciviöus Syćophañt
timelineItems.text: Switched over to #ARGvBEL to see Prince Harry taking a corner. Didn't I just see him in Yorkshire?

timelineItems.comment: Axel Witsel (Belgium) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Sadie Henderson
timelineItems.text: Argentina gained so many American fans for this game. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Soccer Gods
timelineItems.text: Messi: the magic before the goal. #ARGvBEL https://t.co/1wvJIhCTnT

timelineItems.name: TeamNetherlands
timelineItems.text: This game needs Lukaku #ARGvBEL #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Argentina 1, Belgium 0.

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME: #ARG 1, #BEL 0 - #Argentina advance to the semifinals, will face #Netherlands/#CostaRica winner. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Argentina vuelve a las semifinales por primera vez desde 1990, gracias a Higuaín: http://t.co/5rXBnup9Oh #ARGvBEL http://t.co/BaIPKGe6UC

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Argentina vuelve a las semifinales por primera vez desde 1990, gracias a Higuaín: http://t.co/5rXBnup9Oh #ARGvBEL http://t.co/BaIPKGe6UC

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: HALF TIME: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - if I hadn't just woken up, this would be the perfect match to fall asleep to. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - #Netherlands fail to score in the 90 mins and we'll have 30 min of torture, I mean football. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: HT OF ET: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - Pretty sure this one is going to penalties which will favor #CostaRica. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: FT OF ET: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - We will have penalty kicks to decide this one. I say #CostaRica wins. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: END OF PKS: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - #NETHERLANDS ADVANCE ON PKS, 5-3. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: END OF PKS: #NED 0, #CRC 0 - #NETHERLANDS ADVANCE ON PKS, 4-3. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Josh Master
timelineItems.text: Forgot how poor and overrated Hazard is. To think he was compared with Messi earlier this season �� #LOL #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.text: Gonzalo Higuaín makes no mistake with an incredible finish. 1-0 #ARG: http://t.co/HldZtGQ0UI #ARGvBEL http://t.co/Ow2tw2Rnqd

Foul by Lionel Messi (Argentina).

timelineItems.name: Doves
timelineItems.text: Fellaini is a lumbering irrelevance at this level....total bobbins #ARGvBEL #mufc

timelineItems.name: William
timelineItems.text: Belgium are starting to get in there. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Eric W. Robinson
timelineItems.text: One of Belgium’s corner kicks just landed in my back yard. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ángel Di María (Argentina) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Delay in match Ángel Di María (Argentina) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Simon Goddard
timelineItems.text: Belgium just need to be a bit patient in the final 3rd, cos this Argentina defence are not that good at all. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Brian Carroll
timelineItems.text: Superb pass from Messi to Di Maria. Good block from Kompany. So far a better game then what was on show yesterday #ARGvBEL #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Ross Donaldson
timelineItems.text: What a pass from Messi! Lovely through ball #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: Belgium touches today suffering from USMNT-titis. #ARGvBEL #yikes

timelineItems.name: Andrew Pearce
timelineItems.text: Origi must have some dodgy photos of Willmots to keep greeting the nod ahead of Lukaku! #ARGvBEL #FifaWorldCup

timelineItems.text: If that Wexford lad hadnt shanked it wide, I wouldnt have to choose between the #WEXvCLA extra time and #ARGvBEL. #GAA #WorldCup

timelineItems.text: My two cents: Take Fellaini off. Give someone -anyone - else a go. #ArgvBel #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Jayadev Swain
timelineItems.text: Yellow cards flying all over. #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: The Footy Tipster
timelineItems.text: 15mins left and #BEL take off their best player! Strange call. Hasn't had a great game but can still create something from nothing! #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Jayadev Swain
timelineItems.text: #BEL just giving away so many chances. Another 15mins to go. Can they do another of Belgian stunts to score from behind? #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Tony OX3
timelineItems.text: Belgium's Eden Hazard should trademark his name and sell the rights to a film studio to make hero-saves-the-world movies. #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.comment: Gonzalo Higuaín (Argentina) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Jack Drummond
timelineItems.text: Di Maria is the Carmelo Anthony of soccer #neverpass #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.name: Eddie Fremantle
timelineItems.text: #Messi hasn't looked off a yard in the game. Is he fit? Cue a burst of brilliance! #ArgvBel

timelineItems.name: Bobby Moss
timelineItems.text: If I was playing a drinking game with phrases "living up to the sum of its parts" or "Brasilia" I'd be hammered right now #ARGvBEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: David Hack
timelineItems.text: Belgium have been very disappointing today for a 'golden' generation, as 'golden' as Beckham, Gerrard, Owen, etc. #NoCigar #ARGvBEL

timelineItems.text: Belgium are large and immobile, most of the time gets results. Like England 6-7 years ago.. Class below! #ARGvBEL
